title: Linux env Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the env command in Linux, learn how to modify environment variables, and execute commands with custom environments for improved system configuration and settings.

meta.title: Linux env Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the env command in Linux, learn how to modify environment variables, and execute commands with custom environments for improved system configuration and settings.
meta.keywords: Linux, env command, environment variables, system configuration, command execution, practical examples

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Usage of the env Command

verify.name: Verify the current environment variables
verify.hint: The environment variable `MY_VAR` with the value "Hello, World!" should be present in the output of the `env` command.

steps.title: Modify Environment Variables Using the env Command

verify.name: Verify the modification of the environment variable
verify.hint: The value of the `MY_VAR` environment variable should be "Goodbye, World!" when running the command `env MY_VAR="Goodbye, World!" echo $MY_VAR`.

steps.title: Execute Commands with Custom Environment Variables

verify.name: Verify the execution of a command with custom environment variables
verify.hint: The output of the command `env MY_MESSAGE="Hello" MY_NAME="John" echo "$MY_MESSAGE, my name is $MY_NAME!"` should be "Hello, my name is John!".
